name: sesh-sim
description: A thought experiment on the subject of how rounds of drinks work

scripts.npm-publish: npm run build && npm publish dist/src
scripts.npm-publish-ci: copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md dist/src && npm publish dist/src
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version
scripts.postbuild: copyfiles -u 1 src/data.json src/bin/sesh-sim dist/src && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md dist/src
scripts.test: nyc mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive ./__tests__/_loadAllFilesForCoverage.js ./__tests__/**/*.ts --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=__tests__/reporter-config.json
scripts.test-ci: nyc mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive ./__tests__/_loadAllFilesForCoverage.js ./__tests__/**/*.ts --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=__tests__/reporter-config.json
